assessment_item.title: ಸತಿಸಹಗಮನ ಪದ್ಧತಿಯ ನಿಷೇಧ ಕಾಯ್ದೆಯನ್ನು ಬೆಂಬಲಿಸಿದವರು
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ಸತಿಸಹಗಮನ ಪದ್ಧತಿಯ ನಿಷೇಧ ಕಾಯ್ದೆಯನ್ನು ಬೆಂಬಲಿಸಿದವರು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಲಾರ್ಡ್‍ವಿಲಿಯಂ ಬೆಂಟಿಂಕ್

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2204"},{"text":"

ರಾಜಾರಾಮ್ ಮೋಹನ್‍ರಾಯ್

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:2205"},{"text":"

ದಯಾನಂದ ಸರಸ್ವತಿ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2215"},{"text":"

ಸೈಯ್ಯದ್ ಅಹಮದ್ ಖಾನ್

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2220"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"ಸತಿಸಹಗಮನ ಪದ್ಧತಿಯ ನಿಷೇಧ ಕಾಯ್ದೆಯನ್ನು ಬೆಂಬಲಿಸಿದವರು ","title":"ಸತಿಸಹಗಮನ ಪದ್ಧತಿಯ ನಿಷೇಧ ಕಾಯ್ದೆಯನ್ನು ಬೆಂಬಲಿಸಿದವರು ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Kannada","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"Social Studies","qlevel":"EASY","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
